Sequential.title: Component Types
Sequential.Markdown:
# Learning Observer Components
Learning Observer supports many different types of interactive components:
- **Markdown**: For rich markdown content - **TextArea**: For student input - **ActionButton**: For triggering actions - **LLMAction**: For AI integration - **SideBarPanel**: For layout organization - **Course**: For hierarchical content (like this!)
Each component is designed to work seamlessly with others.
